name: VirtualCommunityRadio
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: virtual community radio
des:
Virtual Community Radio: Streaming to the Metaverse and beyond.

Virtual Community Radio (VCRadio) is a music and spoken word internet radio station, aimed at communities in virtual worlds, notably Second Life, as well as listeners on the wider internet. The station was founded in early 2021.

Virtual Community Radio is underscored by a 24/7 "sustaining music service" based primarily around Light Classical music, with a little Easy Listening, Classical and Early Music to complete the mix. On top of this is a growing roster of spoken-word programming that includes drama, readings and talk shows and forms the primary focus of the station. Programmes include "Tarot @ Teatime", a show discussing the history of the cards and how they may be read; "Where Have You Been?", a show that suggests things to do and places to visit around the Second Life Grid; and "The Magic Of The Musical" which focuses on musical theatre from Broadway and beyond, with special guests and monthly topics. Programming subject to change without notice.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
